name: Students-ws
body:
## Welcome to My API.

This data could help you use my API.

### Get All Students
If you want to get all student, please enter the following URL:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/allStudents`

Result example:
```[ { student_id: 1, name: "tom", area: "center", degree: "bsc", grade: 81, year: 1 }, { student_id: 2, name: "yossi", area: "south", degree: "ba", grade: 94, year: 2 }, { student_id: 3, name: "bar", area: "north", degree: "bsc", grade: 92, year: 1 }, { student_id: 4, name: "gal", area: "north", degree: "ba", grade: 72, year: 3 } ]```

###Get Student By Id
you can find a student by his Id, by entering the following URL:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getStudent/id`

Example:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getStudent/1`
and the result will be 
```
{
student_id: 1,
name: "tom",
area: "center",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 81,
year: 1
}
```

###get All Excellence Students
you can find all excellence students, by entering the following URL:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getAllExcellenceStudents`


###Get Excellence Students by Year
you can find a student by their year in school, by entering the following URL:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getExcellenceByYear/year`

year could be a number between 1 and 4, for example:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getExcellenceByYear/1`
and the result will be 
```
[
{
student_id: 3,
name: "bar",
area: "north",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 92,
year: 1
}
]
```

###Get Students by Area
you can find students by the area they are studying in, by entering the following URL:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getStudentByArea/area`

year could enter 'center','south' or 'north, for example:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getStudentByArea/south`
and the result will be 
```
[
{
student_id: 2,
name: "yossi",
area: "south",
degree: "ba",
grade: 94,
year: 2
},
{
student_id: 11,
name: "mor",
area: "south",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 87,
year: 3
},
{
student_id: 12,
name: "koral",
area: "south",
degree: "ba",
grade: 85,
year: 4
},
{
student_id: 17,
name: "yarden",
area: "south",
grade: 73,
degree: "bsc",
year: 3
}
]
```

###Get Student By Degree and Year
You can get student by degree and year by entering the URL bellow:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getStudent/:degree/:year`

For example, to find a student that study for bsc degree and his first year, you can enter:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getStudent/bsc/1`

The result will be:
```
[
{
student_id: 1,
name: "tom",
area: "center",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 81,
year: 1
},
{
student_id: 3,
name: "bar",
area: "north",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 92,
year: 1
},
{
student_id: 7,
name: "tomer",
area: "center",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 65,
year: 1
},
{
student_id: 19,
name: "rona",
area: "north",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 82,
year: 1
}
]
```

###Student with range of grades
To find students that their grades between a range, you can enter the URL bellow:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getGrade/grade1/grade2`

For example, to find students that their grade between 50 and 70, you should enter the URL:
`https://wstudents.herokuapp.com/getGrade/50/70`

The result will be:
```
[
{
student_id: 7,
name: "tomer",
area: "center",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 65,
year: 1
},
{
student_id: 8,
name: "vadim",
area: "north",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 70,
year: 3
}
]
```

### Authors and Contributors
This page was created for the course 'web services' at Shenkar  College for Engineering and Design by Avital Glazer (Avitalg).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? You can contact me.
